description:
Our Blockchain Is Better Than Any Other Blockchain

The world’s only enterprise blockchain solution for global payments

Our service is built on Ethereum Blockchain : Delight token is an ERC20 token.

Benefit from the reliability of the Ethereum network for DLTT ecosystem transactions.

DELIGHT tokens will be at the heart of the use of our intelligent assistant service : subscription, content proposal, rewards, and more.
The fun and friendly internet currency.
name: delightToken
